description: This table contains information on pending orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pended order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user pending the order.

columns.name: PENDED_TIME
columns.description: The time an order was pended.

columns.name: PENDED_FOR
columns.description: The reason an order was pended.

columns.name: RELEASED_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user releasing a pended medication.

columns.name: PEND_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Order pending reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SH_ORDR_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the ordering provider for a signed and held order.

columns.name: SH_AUTH_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the authorizing provider for this signed and held order record. A signed and held order is an order record that has been authorized but is intended for future use and is not yet active.

columns.name: SH_ORDER_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The verbal order mode category ID for the signed and held order, indicating the way the order was placed, e.g. telephone with readback.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Verbal


Standard

columns.name: SH_VERB_ORD_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment entered by a user when creating a signed and held order.

columns.name: SH_VRB_COMM_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the provider who verbally received the order and entered the order record in the system.

columns.name: SH_COSIGN_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user responsible for providing a cosignature for the order.

columns.name: SH_COSIGN_REQ_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this order required a cosignature. 'Y' indicates that the order required a cosignature. 'N' or NULL indicates that the order did not require a cosignature.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SH_VBL_CSN_NO_REQ_N
columns.description: Indicates whether a rule was used to prevent generating a verbal signature requirement for the order record.

columns.name: SH_COS_REQ_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The signature requirement creation source category ID for the order, indicating the reason a cosignature is required for this signed and held order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Automatically Created


HIM


Create Signature Requirement Utility


Patient Creator Utility


Bulk Orders Utility


Beacon


Inactive User Attached to Ordering Provider


Instant Orders


Cosign Checkbox


Cosign Rule


LQL


Profile Setting 8535 - Admission Orders


Profile Setting 8536 - Code Status Orders


Profile Setting 38800 - RW Bulk Orders


Home Health Code Status Order


Anesthesia Sedation Order


Radiant Change Order LPP


Cadence Decision Tree


Security EC36 - Rx Non-controlled


Security EC37 - Rx Controlled w/o C-II


Security EC90 - OP Procedures


Security EC104 - Rx Schedule II


Security EC235 - IP Non-controlled


Security EC236 - IP Controlled w/o C-II


Security EC237 - IP Schedule II


Security EC238 - IP Procedure


Security EC282 - DC Med
